entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • can maui execute code using interperter mode for upload app to appstore? #7516
  • [Android] ListView crashes when navigating to another tab and back #7513
  • iOS Layouts not resizing #7507
  • Unable to run MAUI app after updating to the latest version #7505
  • Resx file does not produce designer file, application is crashing #7504
  • Getting a XamlC error when trying to use common xmlns only in XAML without x:Name #7503
  • Image Retry + Retry Delay #7502
  • Grid measures and layouts itself and children incorrectly #7499
  • Input Transparent not working properly (Android Simulator) when BoxView has InputTransparent set to true and then set to false in backend code. #7498
  • Content page not scrollable and the controls below CarouselView moves on top of CarouselView #7497
  • CarouselView Orientation is Vertical even when set to Horizontal #7496
  • CollectionView within a CollectionView is very slow when loading items #7494
  • The indicatorView render outside of border #7493
  • [Windows][Android][6.0.312] InputTransparent logic/intended behavior #7489
  • LinearGradientBrush overflow button making CornerRadius invisible #7488
  • Entry show without Underline or Bottom line in MAUI GA #7487
  • The underline of label is not displayed on ios and maccatalyst #7486

Closed

  • Buttons missing ripple effect in windows? #7492
  • ListView not scrolling, not selecting after update, extremely slow to update #6943
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • ListView w/ Binding, Delete first item -> Crash (Maui RC3, Android) #7406
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [Android] The ItemTapped event of ListView has no response for a while after Shell's tab changed #6584
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • ContentView: Setting the ControlTemplate dynamically causes the control to disappear #4135
    6.0.300-servicing
  • WinForms BlazorHybrid application fails to run on other machines after being published #7455
  • Editor's SizeChanged event does not get called #5791
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Android: ControlTemplate within a CollectionView ItemTemplate fails to update templated UI when a TemplateBinding changes value #4242
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RC1 - SearchBar does not detect assigned Style #6444
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ANDROID: apk release version is differ from Debug Mode (GA) #7461
  • [RC2] Android - The Navigation.PushModalAsync view cannot be full screen when the NavigationBar and StatusBar was hidden. #6589
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Getting started tutorial - hot reload is not working #7441
  • Windows Machine keeps saying Type '/' to search from your saved info #7233

PullRequests

Created

  • Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport #7514
    area/layout 🔲
  • Hide non visible shell parts from VO #7512
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for Compatibility and Xaml and pack a special docs artifact #7511
    area/docs 📓
  • Return VER for PlatformView #7509
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix SearchBar MaxLength property #7495
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Merged

  • Resolving TableView/ListView issues #7485
    area/ListView
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #7235
    area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7506
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Format #7500
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Use .NET 6 built-in dotnet format tool #6371
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix swapping root page from Shell to Non Shell #7415
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Extensions pack #5918
    area/setup 🪄, .NET 7
  • Better handle disappearing content with ViewPager2 #7425
    area/shell 🐢
  • Merge the PublicAPI checker into main #7339
    p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [iOS] Fix cell size changed on CollectionView #7447
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.3xx-sr1
